stories.name: Gather Stakeholder Requirements
stories.user_story: As a project manager, I want documented requirements so that the development team understands the scope

stories.name: Define Technical Specifications
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want technical specifications so that I can implement features correctly

stories.name: Design Microservices Architecture
stories.user_story: As an architect, I want a microservices design so that the system is scalable

stories.name: Design Core Database Schema
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want a database schema so that I can implement data persistence

stories.name: Configure VPC and Networking
stories.user_story: As a DevOps engineer, I want VPC configured so that services can communicate securely

stories.name: Provision EKS Cluster
stories.user_story: As a DevOps engineer, I want an EKS cluster so that I can deploy containerized services

stories.name: Set Up RDS PostgreSQL
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want a managed database so that I can store application data

stories.name: Create CI Pipeline
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want automated builds so that code is tested on every push

stories.name: Create CD Pipeline
stories.user_story: As a DevOps engineer, I want automated deployments so that releases are consistent

stories.name: Create Service Dockerfiles
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want Dockerized services so that they run consistently

stories.name: Set Up Prometheus and Grafana
stories.user_story: As a DevOps engineer, I want monitoring so that I can track system health

stories.name: Implement JWT Token Generation
stories.user_story: As a user, I want to receive a token on login so that I can access protected resources

stories.name: Implement Token Validation
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want token validation so that only authenticated users access APIs

stories.name: Integrate Google OAuth
stories.user_story: As a user, I want to sign in with Google so that I don't need another password

stories.name: Integrate Microsoft OAuth
stories.user_story: As a user, I want to sign in with Microsoft so that I can use my work account

stories.name: Implement Permission System
stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to define permissions so that I can control access

stories.name: Implement Role Assignment
stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to assign roles to users so that they have appropriate access

stories.name: Set Up Kong API Gateway
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want an API gateway so that requests are routed correctly

stories.name: Create User Model
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want a user model so that I can store user data

stories.name: Create Organization Model
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want an organization model so that I can implement multi-tenancy

stories.name: Generate OpenAPI Documentation
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want API documentation so that I can understand endpoints

stories.name: Initialize React Project
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want a React project so that I can build the frontend

stories.name: Set Up Redux Store
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want Redux so that I can manage application state

stories.name: Create Auth Slice
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want an auth slice so that I can manage authentication state

stories.name: Configure React Router
stories.user_story: As a user, I want navigation so that I can move between pages

stories.name: Implement Protected Routes
stories.user_story: As a user, I want protected routes so that unauthorized access is prevented

stories.name: Build Button Components
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want button components so that I have consistent UI

stories.name: Build Form Components
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want form components so that I can build forms consistently

stories.name: Build Navigation Component
stories.user_story: As a user, I want navigation so that I can access different sections

stories.name: Build Sidebar Component
stories.user_story: As a user, I want a sidebar so that I can access features quickly

stories.name: Implement Theme Provider
stories.user_story: As a user, I want theme support so that I can choose my preferred appearance

stories.name: Build User Profile API
stories.user_story: As a user, I want to manage my profile so that my information is accurate

stories.name: Build User Profile UI
stories.user_story: As a user, I want a profile page so that I can view and edit my details

stories.name: Build Role Management API
stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to manage roles so that I can control permissions

stories.name: Build Role Management UI
stories.user_story: As an admin, I want a role management interface so that I can configure roles easily

stories.name: Build Team Management API
stories.user_story: As a manager, I want to manage teams so that I can organize users

stories.name: Build Team Management UI
stories.user_story: As a manager, I want a team interface so that I can manage my team

stories.name: Build Organization API
stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to manage organizations so that tenants are isolated

stories.name: Build Organization UI
stories.user_story: As an admin, I want an org management interface so that I can configure organizations

stories.name: Implement Tenant Middleware
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want tenant isolation so that data is segregated

stories.name: Build Org Settings API
stories.user_story: As an admin, I want org settings so that I can customize the organization

stories.name: Build Org Settings UI
stories.user_story: As an admin, I want a settings page so that I can configure the organization

stories.name: Build Project API
stories.user_story: As a user, I want to create projects so that I can organize work

stories.name: Build Project UI
stories.user_story: As a user, I want a project interface so that I can manage projects

stories.name: Build Task API
stories.user_story: As a user, I want to create tasks so that I can track work items

stories.name: Build Task UI
stories.user_story: As a user, I want a task interface so that I can manage tasks

stories.name: Build Kanban Board
stories.user_story: As a user, I want a Kanban board so that I can visualize workflow

stories.name: Build Workflow Designer UI
stories.user_story: As a user, I want to design workflows visually so that I can automate processes

stories.name: Build Workflow Engine Backend
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want a workflow engine so that workflows execute correctly

stories.name: Create Workflow Templates
stories.user_story: As a user, I want workflow templates so that I can start quickly

stories.name: Build File Upload API
stories.user_story: As a user, I want to upload files so that I can share documents

stories.name: Build File Upload UI
stories.user_story: As a user, I want an upload interface so that I can easily upload files

stories.name: Implement Document Versioning
stories.user_story: As a user, I want document versions so that I can track changes

stories.name: Build Document Preview
stories.user_story: As a user, I want to preview documents so that I don't need to download them

stories.name: Build Dashboard Builder
stories.user_story: As a user, I want to build dashboards so that I can visualize data

stories.name: Build Report Generator
stories.user_story: As a user, I want to generate reports so that I can analyze data

stories.name: Build Charts Components
stories.user_story: As a user, I want charts so that I can visualize metrics

stories.name: Implement Slack Integration
stories.user_story: As a user, I want Slack notifications so that I stay informed

stories.name: Implement Calendar Integration
stories.user_story: As a user, I want calendar sync so that tasks appear in my calendar

stories.name: Build Webhook System
stories.user_story: As a developer, I want webhooks so that I can integrate with external systems

stories.name: Build Email Notification System
stories.user_story: As a user, I want email notifications so that I receive updates

stories.name: Build Push Notification System
stories.user_story: As a user, I want push notifications so that I get real-time alerts

stories.name: Implement WebSocket Updates
stories.user_story: As a user, I want real-time updates so that I see changes immediately
